sentence.Network_cn: 苜蓿科植物广泛用作动物饲料。

sentence.Network_en: Old movies were the cheapest broadcast fodder.
sentence.Network_cn: 老电影是最廉价的播放素材。

sentence.Network_en: The conscripts were treated as cannon fodder.
sentence.Network_cn: 应征入伍者被当做炮灰。

beet的翻译中文意思-在线英汉词典 ... fibrous beet 多纤维的甜菜 fodder beet 饲料甜菜 garden beet 菜用甜菜, [俗]紫菜头.
fodder rotation 饲料轮作fodder unit 饲料单位fodder yield 饲草产量
2007年1月30日 - 青饲料 (green fodder) 在饲料分类系统中属第二类饲料,它以富含叶绿素而得名,种类繁多,主要包括天然牧草、栽培牧草、青饲作物、叶菜类饲料、树枝树叶及.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English fōdor, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch voeder and German Futter, also to food

entry.def: Fodder is food that is given to cows, horses, and other animals.

example.ex: The alfalfa plant is widely used as animal fodder.
example.tran: 苜蓿科植物广泛用作动物饲料。

entry.def: If you say that something is fodder for a particular purpose, you mean that it is useful for that purpose and perhaps nothing else.

example.ex: The press conference simply provided more fodder for another attack on his character...
example.tran: 记者招待会只不过是提供了更多的再次击他人格的口实。

example.ex: Old movies were the cheapest broadcast fodder.
example.tran: 老电影是最廉价的播放素材。

means.word_mean: 1. coarse food (especially for cattle and horses) composed of entire plants or the leaves and stalks of a cereal crop

auth_sentence.content: You never had to buy fodder for your goats.
auth_sentence.res_content: You never had to buy fodder for your goats.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You never had to buy fodder for your goats.

auth_sentence.content: There is no husk, no oilcake or fodder here.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is no husk, no oilcake or fodder here.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is no husk, no oilcake or fodder here.

auth_sentence.content: There was hardly enough fodder for the soldiers' mounts.
auth_sentence.res_content: There was hardly enough fodder for the soldiers' mounts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There was hardly enough fodder for the soldiers' mounts.

sentences.en: This kind of grass is a common fodder for horses.
sentences.cn: 这种草是普通马的饲料。

sentences.en: Their lives were not considered important—they were just the cannon fodder.
sentences.cn: 没人关心他们的死活，他们只是炮灰而已。

sentences.en: The team had no intention of being cannon fodder when they played the champions, and were determined to win.
sentences.cn: 这支队伍参赛时无意充当炮灰，他们志在必得。

sentences.en: He was so young that he couldn’t cut his own fodder.
sentences.cn: 他那时还很年轻,连自己的事都处理不好。
